app.models.AnimalFactory module¶

class app.models.AnimalFactory.AnimalFactory¶

Bases: object

static getAnimal(name, sex, age, healthy, animalType, other)¶

Given a species name, create an animal of corresponding species

Args:
name (string): Animal name sex (string): Male or female age (int): Age of animal healthy (bool): Health status of animal animalType (string): Species name that dictates instantation other (Dictionary): Any unique parameters to the subclasses
Returns:
Animal: New animal of desired subclass
